catalog_script_client.name: onChange Reservation DateTime Unique

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_1fb78ce597360110002ffef3a253af30
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Car Rental Reservation">2627b0af97428110002ffef3a253afdf</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:2468b8ef97428110002ffef3a253afd0</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onChange Reservation DateTime Unique</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   g_form.hideErrorBox('car');
	
	var carId = g_form.getValue('car');
	var startDateTime = new Date(g_form.getValue('start_datetime'));
	var endDateTime = new Date(newValue);

	var ga = new GlideAjax('ReservationUtils'); 
	ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "checkExistingReservation"); 
	
	ga.addParam("sysparm_car_id", carId);
	ga.addParam("sysparm_start_dt", startDateTime);
	ga.addParam("sysparm_end_dt", endDateTime);
	
	ga.getXML(getResponse);
}

function getResponse(response) {
	var data = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer'); 
	
	if(data == 'true') {
		g_form.showErrorBox('car', 'This car is not available at your chosen time');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>maryanne.labasan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 05:01:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1fb78ce597360110002ffef3a253af30</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChange Reservation DateTime Unique</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Car Rental Reservation" source="x_616811_car_renta">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car Rental Reservation">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1fb78ce597360110002ffef3a253af30</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>maryanne.labasan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 01:43:25</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
